name: Screw them
description:
Screw them is a "Hack an Slay game where you play a robot who´s planet is invaded by evil cows. 

Because of our time limit and some problems, we didn’t manage to create a Storyline. There are two Redeyebulls in the west and in the north- east and in the south are Cow-Hydras. You have to kill all the cows to save your planet. To get bigger and Stronger u have to disassemble your friends. 

Game mechanics:

left mous:                        klick to move

right mous:                     whirlwind attack

Shift + left mous:        straight shoot

E:                                         disassemble your friends
